import React from "react"; import FormatDate from "./FormatDate"; import "./Weather.css"; export default function WeatherInfo(props) { console.log(props.data); return (

{props.info.city}

{props.data.description}

{Math.round(props.info.temperature)} °C | F
  • Humidity: {props.info.humidity} %
  • Wind: {props.info.wind} km/h
  • Feelslike:{" "} {Math.round(props.info.feelslike)} °C
); }
